summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 FORD EXPEDITION.  IMMEDIATELY AFTER PURCHASING THE VEHICLE ON DECEMBER 22, 2008, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE HEAD RESTS ON BOTH THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDES OFFERED NO SUPPORT BETWEEN THE BACK AND SHOULDERS.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE HEAD RESTS WERE MANUFACTURED IN THAT MANNER AS A SAFETY FEATURE.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY WERE NOT LIABLE FOR REPAIRING THE HEAD RESTS BECAUSE THERE WAS NO DEFECT.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 700 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 10.     UPDATED 02/10/09  *BF  THE CONSUMER STATED THE SEAT WERE NOT COMFORTABLE. UPDATED. 02/11/09. *JB
